channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitron Systems DVR -- DVR LGUVR-16H
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hitron Systems DVR -- DVR LGUVR-16H

item.title: CVE-2024-23842|2024-01-23T04:56:41.242Z -- hitron%20systems%20dvr -- dvr%20lguvr-16h
item.description: Improper Input Validation in Hitron Systems DVR LGUVR-16H 1.02~4.02 allows an attacker to cause network attack in case of using defalut admin ID/PW.
